events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this purchase was meant for a gift.
The customer issue was identified to pertain to refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. to handle the refund request related to the order error.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry for the inconvenience with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify the details and process your refund?
Here is the photo of the item I got along with the order number: 987654321. I didn't receive what I ordered, please advise on next steps.

Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. Please return the wrong item using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The refund process has been initiated and the shipping label for the return was sent to the customer’s email address.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and the return went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled very professionally. Thanks again for your help.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience for this refund request.
